title: Bug 7581: ComboBoxCellEditor does not size correctly in property sheet
description: From ECJoe Winchester <JoeWin@us.ibm.com>: The ComboBoxCellEditor in the property sheet does not size correctly when used with certain data. The editor appears too small and cuts off the contents of the dropdown list. This issue affects the proper functioning of the property sheet.
OB: ComboBoxCellEditor in the property sheet does not size correctly, causing the contents of the dropdown list to be cut off
